meanings.sent1: I saw a school of smelts swimming in the river.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen enjoy catching smelts for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The smelts in the aquarium seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight reflected off the smelts in the water, creating a magical scene.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared a delicious dish using fresh smelts.

meanings.definition: To melt or fuse (metal) in order to extract the metal.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith smelts the ore to create new tools.
meanings.sent2: In the factory, they smelt the metal to make car parts.
meanings.sent3: The dragon tried to smelt gold coins in its fiery breath.
meanings.sent4: The intense heat of the furnace smelts the metal into liquid form.
meanings.sent5: The artist smelts old keys to create unique sculptures.
